title: How to be accepted in YG Entertainment? I am a 14-year-old Iranian girl. Is it possible for me to become an idol - Quora

response.answer_text: Unfortunately if you aren’t southeast or east asian, your chances are next to 0. But if you have talent and meet the Korean Beauty Standards, then you have a good chance since you’re also young. Good luck! Dm me if you have more questions about auditions.
